creator: t.lavers@pks.com.au
text:
In changing from Ant1.4 to Ant1.4.1 I have encountered the problem that the 
classes for my tasks cannot be found. The only thing I changed was the version 
of ant being used...no class or other files were changed in any way (in 
particular, the class files are still in the same place and the build file is 
unchanged). 

When I use the -verbose option I get:
D:\pks\v5\local\build.xml:96: taskdef class ant.tools.vss.CheckOutFile cannot be
 found
        at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Definer.addDefinition(Definer.java:180)

        at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Definer.execute(Definer.java:114)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectHelper$TaskHandler.finished(ProjectHelper
.java:485)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectHelper$AbstractHandler.endElement(Project

We had some changes in our classloader stuff between 1.3 and 1.4, but I'm not
aware of any changes between 1.4 and 1.4.1.

Could you show us a build file snippet, tell us where everything can be found
and maybe give us the output of ant -debug?

Thanks
creator: bodewig@apache.org
